headline: Option Care Health, Inc. (OPCH): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Option Care Health, Inc. on Brian’s Substack by Brian Flasker. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on OPCH. Option Care Health, Inc.’s share was trading at $29.35 as of July 31st. OPCH’s trailing and forward P/E were 23.29 and 19.65, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Option Care […]
